title: Media project: a film about media coverage of the Gulf War and memory
creator_credit: Watkins Rapier productions, Chris Haywood and Peter Watkins
brief_description: Raises debate on the global media coverage of the Gulf War by taking examples from the Australian media coverage of the event and having them discussed by a small group of people from different backgrounds who are having dinner together. Written by Peter Watkins in conjunction with the cast, many of whom are expressing their own feelings and concerns. A Teaching guide accompanies the video and is available for separate loan.
